body: I'm thinking of buying gold (permanent) and I just want some opinions on if it's worth it and why/why not
body_tagged: I'm thinking of buying gold (permanent) and I just want some opinions on if it's worth it and why/why not
title: Is gold worth it?

replies.body: If you want to support the server, it's 100% worth it :3
replies.body_tagged: If you want to support the server, it's 100% worth it :3

replies.body: Yea it is, for one supporting the server is always worth it. Overall being able to join teams with your friends without fail, and the kits are great.
replies.body_tagged: Yea it is, for one supporting the server is always worth it. Overall being able to join teams with your friends without fail, and the kits are great.

replies.body:
It really does!
If you can and you love the server (as D00ZiE said) buy it ;)
replies.body_tagged:
It really does!
If you can and you love the server (as D00ZiE said) buy it ;)

replies.body:
The XP boost makes a huge difference. I noticed it immediately once I got the rank.
If you play with friends, joining their team is a huge benefit.
If you ever plan on coming to TeamSpeak, the suite is pretty active at times and the poor non-donors are excluded :c
Premium kits are quite a benefit especially for Nexus and CTH.

I personally recommend it :D

If you ever plan on coming to TeamSpeak, the suite is pretty active at times and the poor non-donors are excluded :c
Premium kits are quite a benefit especially for Nexus and CTH.

I personally recommend it :D

replies.body:
If you play on the server daily,and luv the server, I recommend you should buy it,
I bought Gold because i love the server and it's really worth it. 
Hope you get it :D
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Yeah, if you're wondering if it's worth it or if you want it, it's worth it (:
It's tons of fun to be able to easily play with your friends! :3

replies.body: It's extremely worth it, I really wish I could donate :( but yah... you really should consider donating, it gives you great perks, and you can help one of your favorite servers! :)
